name: AOAI_KEY_NAME
value: <name of your secret for the Azure OpenAI key in Azure Key Vault>

name: COMMS_CONN_STR_NAME
value: <name of your secret for the Azure Communication Service connection string in Azure Key Vault>

name: DEST_NAME
value: <name of your target destination, e.g., Lyngby St.>

name: LINES
value: <comma-separated list of lines you are using, e.g., A, E, 250S>

name: ORIGIN_NAME
value: <name of your target destination, e.g., København H>

name: SYSTEM_EMAIL
value: <email you created in Azure Communication Service>

name: VIA_NAMES
value: <comma-separated list of transfer stations, e.g., Nørreport St., Østerport St.>
